1069986805909504000.text:
#opensource project - @leapdao  manages via holocracy.

From site : https://www.holacracy.org/what-is-holacracy … 
"Most decisions are done locally"

Instead of top down governance, workers are given rulesets, smaller incremental decisions.

Increasing atomisation of human jobs => easier to outsourcepic.twitter.com/7KWUieNndt

1095691001556074496.text:
We're super happy to announce that LeapDAO took a leap to the mainnet! Our community is now operating a More Viable Plasma chain on the Ethereum mainnet 

Find out more here: 
https://leapdao.org/blog/Plasma-Mainnet-Launched/ …
#plasma #plasmamainnet #ethereum #scalability

1094938512946880513.text:
Lifting the execution of #smartcontracts onto a #layer2 blockchain is key to extending capacities of #Ethereum. To make this happen, LeapDAO is working on a SolEVM Enforcer, a computation verification game, and its integration with the #Plasma chain. 

:https://leapdao.org/blog/Smart-Contracts-on-Plasma/ …

1093872136903639042.text: Also, we just found out on reddit that our website looks like it came out of a cereal box.. That's a compliment, no?  pic.twitter.com/1ZsnEISvaH
